last_episode_to_air.name: Deliver Us From Evil
last_episode_to_air.overview: A newlywed couple experiences unexplained events after moving into a remote cabin. When they make a gruesome discovery, they fear the previous owner never left. After a terrifying attack, they must find a way to expel the angry spirit before it's too late.

name: A Haunting
overview: These are the true stories of the innocent and the unimaginable. Based on true events, A Haunting dramatises some of the scariest stories, revealing a world in which tragedy, suicide and murder have left psychic impressions so powerful that innocent people become forced to deal with them decades later. Through mesmerizing first-person accounts, the mystery and origin of each haunting is powerfully revealed and leaves a lingering sense that life—and death—are much stronger then anyone could have possibly imagined.

episodes.name: The Lake Club Horror
episodes.overview: In 1974, a nightclub in Springfield, Illinois, is haunted by the ghost of a suicide victim.

episodes.name: The Haunting of Summerwind
episodes.overview: A house called Summerwind in West Bay Lake, Wis., with a long and storied past filled with ghosts and mysterious occurrences.

episodes.name: Hell House
episodes.overview: Three ghosts and one demon harass the terrified Beckwith family when they move into a 19th century Connecticut house.

episodes.name: Cursed
episodes.overview: A home in Tucson exerts a strange aura and exhibits a shadowy figure.

episodes.name: Echoes from the Grave
episodes.overview: In the 1960s, a Brady Bunch-like family moves into a historic Baltimore house that proves haunted. The ghost expert Hans Holzer comes to the rescue.

episodes.name: Darkness Follows
episodes.overview: In Montreal, a couple's new home in an old townhouse proves to be haunted by the ghosts of a 15-year-old girl craving maternal love and an evil abortionist from the 1940s.

episodes.name: Gateway to Hell
episodes.overview: The owner of a country music dance hall becomes worried when his pregnant wife blames a dangerous fall on a ghost and his handyman exhibits signs of demonic possession.

episodes.name: The Diabolical
episodes.overview: A girl who is unable to walk or talk becomes a human portal for a demon.

episodes.name: Demon Child
episodes.overview: A courier in Kentucky feels helpless when her small boy's invisible playmate proves to be a demon. Her old friend, a shaman, is her only hope of saving her son.

episodes.name: Sallie's House
episodes.overview: A young couple with a new baby learns that the ghost of a seven-year-old girl named Sallie lives in their home. The wife is fascinated, but the husband is terrified.

episodes.name: Hungry Ghosts
episodes.overview: An American family moves into a mansion in Taiwan and soon learns the ghost-infested house was built to terrorize its occupants.

episodes.name: Where Demons Dwell
episodes.overview: A young boy joins his sister and her boyfriend as they spend the day cleaning their new rental house. Immediately, a demon in the house torments the boy and takes possession of him.

episodes.name: Ghost Soldier
episodes.overview: A single mother of two girls discovers a photograph of her ex-boyfriend's brother, who died in the Vietnam. Soon the dead soldier is haunting her house.

episodes.name: House of the Dead
episodes.overview: A family in Maryland find their new home is menaced by a pair of ghosts who attack them in their beds and throw things about the house.

episodes.name: Dark Forest
episodes.overview: A haunted crawlspace and a sinister forest are the source of trouble-making spirits in Hinsdale, New York.

episodes.name: A Haunting in Florida
episodes.overview: An ex-army ranger can do nothing when his pregnant wife and baby daughter are threatened by the ghosts of a cigar-smoking man and a glaring old woman.

episodes.name: Fear House
episodes.overview: A man and his three children are driven out of their house by unexplained noises and frightening visions, but ominous dreams send him back to help the new occupants.

episodes.name: The Attic
episodes.overview: A single mother moves into a new house and soon comes to believe that the ghost of an old tenant who suffered a tragic death is still in the attic.

episodes.name: Hidden Terror
episodes.overview: A home in Corning, N.Y., harbors an evil spirit that is affecting a couple's relationship.

episodes.name: The Unleashed
episodes.overview: A man unearths an Indian burial ground, and demons turn on his family and threaten their lives.

episodes.name: A Haunting in Ireland
episodes.overview: Following the birth of a baby girl, a family in Galway, Ireland, is plagued by eerie sounds, flying objects and a mysterious orb.

episodes.name: The Forgotten
episodes.overview: A woman, her two sons and fiancé are forced from their Salt Lake City home by strange noises and violent apparitions, so they contact a psychic to cleanse the house.

episodes.name: The Wheatsheaf Horror
episodes.overview: An English pub is haunted by the spirit of a mischievous young girl, but when the staff try to contact her, they unwittingly unleash the ghost of her murderer.

episodes.name: The Possessed
episodes.overview: Paranormal investigator Mary Vogel encounters demons while investigating a case, resulting in her having nightmares and being attacked by unseen entities, so she considers having an exorcism.

episodes.name: The Presence
episodes.overview: A woman consults a demonologist after evil forces frighten her children.

episodes.name: The Dark Side
episodes.overview: Renovations to a historic manor house are stymied by flickering lights and doors that don't stay shut until the owners discover it was built on an old cemetery.

episodes.name: Dark Wrath
episodes.overview: Cindy Sarro's boyfriend, Jake, surprises her and their two daughters with a new house. It seems perfect until she senses the presence of a demon that possesses Jake, who comes at her with an ax.

episodes.name: The Awakening
episodes.overview: A police dispatcher sees the spirits of a man and two women in her home and learns from a Bible-toting paranormal investigator that the male ghost is there to feed off her fear.

episodes.name: The Calling
episodes.overview: A mother of two, happily married to her second husband, receives a bite mark from the ghost of a young boy, followed by frightening messages from the beyond.

episodes.name: The Apartment
episodes.overview: A young couple going to college in Seattle find their apartment is haunted by the ghosts of a frightened teenage boy and a cigarette-flicking gunman.

episodes.name: Spirits of the Dead
episodes.overview: The owner of a horse farm, with a business in training student boarders to compete horse-riding competitions, seeks the aid of a Shambhala practitioner to clear the property of trapped spirits.

episodes.name: Where Evil Lurks
episodes.overview: An 18th-century house in Arkansas comes complete with a portal from hell, which allows a demon to terrorize the young family that has just moved in.

episodes.name: Spellbound
episodes.overview: An aspiring writer develops an obsession with Wicca, which alienates her Christian son and unleashes powers that she can't control.

episodes.name: Echoes of the Past
episodes.overview: A family of four makes a new home out of an old colonial house in Vermont, but their renovations unleash several restless spirits, including a pair of mischievous twin girls.

episodes.name: Ghost Hunter
episodes.overview: A ghost hunter and ex-cop allows her son to join a nighttime investigation of a graveyard. The teenage boy's innocent use of a pair of divining rods allows a demon to attach itself to him.

episodes.name: Stalked by Evil
episodes.overview: The ghost of a drug-related murder victim terrorizes a teenage girl in her bedroom.

episodes.name: Casa de los Muertos
episodes.overview: Examining the story of jazz guitarist Eddie Benitez, who moved his family to Tempe, Ariz., in 2005, but strange occurrences plagued the house and his son became gravely ill.

episodes.name: Monster in the Apartment
episodes.overview: A 20-year-old woman is terrified for, and of, her new roommate when his recent divorce and a diagnosis of blood cancer leave him vulnerable to a demon in their new apartment.

episodes.name: Legend Trippers
episodes.overview: Three teenage boys, with little else to do in the small town of Green Lake, Wisconsin, decide to spend Halloween night in the reputedly haunted Dartford Cemetery.

episodes.name: Blood Visions
episodes.overview: A family's dream home in Michigan turns into a nightmare when strange things start to happen, particularly to their son.

episodes.name: Angels and Demons
episodes.overview: Season 5 begins with a single mother in Maryland asking for angelic help to fight what she believes to be a demon.

episodes.name: Nightmare in Bridgeport
episodes.overview: Connecticut paranormal investigator Bob Baker calls for backup to get rid of a reported demon at his own mother's home.

episodes.name: House of Horrors
episodes.overview: The owners of an Arkansas home that's said to be haunted explore the residence's history, which includes the violent death of a previous occupant.

episodes.name: Dark Dreams
episodes.overview: The story of an attorney from Michigan, who claims that he and his family experienced terrifying dreams and ghost sightings after moving into their home.

episodes.name: Nightmare Upstairs
episodes.overview: A family claim that their dream house in Arkansas turned into a nightmare when supernatural forces threatened their daughters.

episodes.name: Back from the Grave
episodes.overview: A North Carolina couple call paranormal experts for help after they become convinced a dark force is messing with their children.

episodes.name: The Uninvited
episodes.overview: A couple claim that the historic restaurant they purchased in Connecticut came with uninvited guests of the demonic kind that are threatening their staff and customers.

episodes.name: The Exorcism of Cindy Sauer
episodes.overview: A Georgia single mom coping with the sudden death of her husband enlists a pastor to perform an exorcism after becoming convinced that a dark force is haunting her.

episodes.name: Death's Door
episodes.overview: The story of a New Mexico woman who escapes a near-death experience only to find herself unable to shake the feeling that a dark force is threatening her.

episodes.name: Marked by Evil
episodes.overview: Season 6 begins with the story of a woman who rejected the advances of a friend, who then stole a piece of her hair and supposedly put a spell on her.

episodes.name: Well to Hell
episodes.overview: A man's story of returning to his childhood home only to find it filled with alleged dark forces that are trying to kill him.

episodes.name: Black Magic
episodes.overview: An alleged ghostly encounter is recalled by a family whose teenage son dabbled in the occult.

episodes.name: Haunted Victorian
episodes.overview: A couple recall how their dream home turned into a nightmare after an alleged demonic possession and attack in the sixth-season finale.

episodes.name: Demon's Revenge
episodes.overview: Two different entities roam the property of a 200-year-old farmhouse, terrorizing the family living there. But they are determined to stay in the home, escalating the paranormal activity to threatening heights.

episodes.name: The Shadowman
episodes.overview: Two brothers encounter a demonic entity in the woods surrounding their Florida home and confront their tormenter decades later.

episodes.name: Demon Unearthed
episodes.overview: After a dark entity is awakened beneath a 19th century mansion, the Rice family experiences a terrifying haunting that forces them to abandon their dream house.

episodes.name: Evil Never Dies
episodes.overview: A family’s dream home quickly turns to their nightmare when they become the focus of an abusive ghost.  When the haunting turns violent, they seek out an empathy and discover the dark history of the property.

episodes.name: Ashes to Evil
episodes.overview: Fire reveals the dark and deadly past of a family's new home. They must find help before a demon claims their lives as well.

episodes.name: Devil Inside Me
episodes.overview: John Drenner, Jr. finds a satanic bible and unwittingly unleashes a relentless demon that will stop at nothing to destroy him.

episodes.name: Child's Play
episodes.overview: When a relentless demon threatens to shatter the idyllic home life of the close-knit Cupit family they turn to a team of paranormal investigators and demonologist to battle the evil force and force it back into hell.

episodes.name: Ghost Fury
episodes.overview: When the Cain family moves into an Ohio farmhouse, they soon find out their idyilic home and property are haunted by ghosts of a brutal murder and a deadly blaze

episodes.name: Nightmare in the Attic
episodes.overview: When a family moves into a home with a dark, hidden history, they soon begin to realize they are not alone.  Dark rituals and death have attracted evil to the home and it has the children in its sight.

episodes.name: Shape of Evil
episodes.overview: After a series of unexplained events, a young family discovers a long history of death connected to their new home and wonders if it’s haunted. But when the family is attacked, they turn to investigators before a shape-shifting demon turns vicious.

episodes.name: Trapped in Terror
episodes.overview: When Taylor Jones’ estranged mother comes to visit, she opens their home up to the world of the undead. Taylor turns to a team of paranormal investigators who uncover the brutal truth of what happened in her attic years ago.

episodes.name: Portal of Doom
episodes.overview: A mother and son match wits against a vicious demon who uses an ancient artifact to open portals in their home.

episodes.name: Ghost Inferno
episodes.overview: A young family senses a presence in their home. At first they suspect a prowler until they realize the house is haunted by a ghost who tragically died on the property. When things turn violent, will the family reclaim their home before it's too late?

episodes.name: Curse of the Mummy
episodes.overview: After a chilling encounter with an Egyptian mummy, a young man is plagued by a vile creature that seeks to steal his soul.

episodes.name: Conjuring Evil
episodes.overview: After a teenager experiments with the occult, darkness is attracted to her Alaskan home.  It targets the family, driving them apart before attacking. As it grows stronger the family realizes their lives are at risk, and turn to experts for help.

episodes.name: Phantom Room
episodes.overview: A family discovers a secret room in their new home, enraging a volatile ghost who will stop at nothing to drive them out.

episodes.name: Heartland Horror
episodes.overview: A teenager with paranormal abilities matches wits against a cagey demon intent on engineering the teen's demise when Season 8 begins.

episodes.name: Mind Control
episodes.overview: A family find an evil necklace while renovating a relative's home, and end up bringing a dark entity into their own house, which is why they've contacted a demonologist for help.

episodes.name: Eternal Grief
episodes.overview: What seems like a dream home in rural Indiana quickly turns into something darker when the new owner experiences unexplained voices and scents, which lead her to believe the house is haunted by the ghost of the previous occupant.

episodes.name: Game of Lies
episodes.overview: A family worry about the negative effect an imaginary friend, which they soon come to believe is an angry ghost, is having on their daughter.

episodes.name: Evil Rises
episodes.overview: A woman assumes orbs she notices in some photos are images of friendly spirits. However, when a dark entity begins tormenting her family, she realizes they are dealing with evil and steps need to be taken to protect her loved ones.

episodes.name: Tunnel of Death
episodes.overview: Candace and John St. Clair explore a tunnel with a gruesome history; an uninvited guest follows them home.

episodes.name: House of Sorrows
episodes.overview: A couple move into a home with a tragic history and soon come to believe that it's haunted. After several attacks, they call paranormal investigators for help, but a careless mistake could make things worse.

episodes.name: Demons Never Die
episodes.overview: A home is invaded by what is believed to be a demon hell-bent on hurting the members of a family one by one.

episodes.name: Ghosts of War
episodes.overview: After a menacing Nazi soldier seeks vengeance for his death and threatens an innocent couple, they seek help to make peace with his ghost.

episodes.name: Vision of Terror
episodes.overview: A woman suspects that her late husband is haunting her home. But then an incident involving her daughter makes her wonder if she's dealing with an evil entity.

episodes.name: Demon's Lair
episodes.overview: A new season begins with with a family who believe the ghost in their home is harmless until the children feel threatened, which prompts a plea to the Catholic Church to rid them of this demon.

episodes.name: Ghost Confessions
episodes.overview: An attractive teenage girl is haunted by an unknown presence with inappropriate intentions that threaten to tear her family apart.

episodes.name: Immortal Love
episodes.overview: A tormented teen's ghost disrupts a young family's life in their new home.

episodes.name: Love Curse
episodes.overview: Newlyweds are unnerved by a dangerous paranormal presence that they need to get rid of before their first child is born.

episodes.name: Ghost Protector
episodes.overview: A mother and daughter agree that their house is definitely haunted, though the former thinks it's the spirit of her murdered boyfriend, while the latter believes it's something much more sinister.

episodes.name: Fear Feeders
episodes.overview: A man moves into a house that's believed to be haunted by dark entities that have been preying on the property's residents for years.

episodes.name: Mother's Terror
episodes.overview: A woman buys a fixer-upper on Long Island after her firefighter husband dies in the line of duty, but the renovations uncover evidence of a dark history on the property.

episodes.name: Dangerous Games
episodes.overview: Communicating with a ghost is a pleasant experience for three siblings until it opens a door for all spirits—good and evil.

episodes.name: Living Nightmare
episodes.overview: A woman who was tormented as a child has to deal with an old spirit that resurfaces to haunt her family.

episodes.name: Bewitched
episodes.overview: A family's lives are at stake while they try to battle an evil entity sent to tear a young couple apart.

episodes.name: Face of Evil
episodes.overview: After a trip to a haunted plantation, Joy and her young daughters fall prey to a relentless phantom that is tied to a harrowing experience from Joy's distant past.

episodes.name: Ghostly Voices
episodes.overview: When their daughter hears a voice in her head and begins acting strangely, the Balistreri's search for the cause. Could her behavior be related to paranormal activity in the house or is it all in her head?

episodes.name: Untouchable
episodes.overview: After Linda returns from an overseas trip, paranormal events begin happening in the Dravis home. Ready to flee the home, Linda calls in the help of a clairvoyant as a last attempt to find answers to whom or what is haunting their home.

episodes.name: Buried Secrets
episodes.overview: When a nefarious spirit lashes out at a Florida man, he delves into a rash of paranormal activity from his childhood to uncover the imminent threat behind a mysterious and deadly family curse.

episodes.name: Masks of Terror
episodes.overview: When a woman buys a set of Haitian masks to decorate her dream home, the voodoo spirit attached to the masks emerges to wreak havoc.

episodes.name: Field of Ghosts
episodes.overview: When a teenager with the "gift" finds herself the attention of restless spirits, she has to convince her family the ghosts are real before enlisting experts who can reveal who these spirits are and what they want with her.

episodes.name: Wicked Eviction
episodes.overview: Tammy Shea relocates her family for a fresh start but her dream turns to a nightmare when her family is antagonized by multiple entities. Desperate, Tammy finds a paranormal team who reveal the true evil in the home.

episodes.name: Grave Awakenings
episodes.overview: A woman makes the harrowing discovery that her new townhouse harbors a paranormal portal. Even more shocking, the activity has awakened her dormant ability as a psychic medium, forcing her to confront the dead.

episodes.name: Norman the Doll
episodes.overview: A paranormal investigator doesn't believe in haunted objects until he captures proof that an antique doll he recently acquired is possessed. He attempts to get rid of it, but the evil toy has other plans.

episodes.name: When the Lights Go Out
episodes.overview: Newlyweds find themselves the targets of an aggressive spirit after bringing home souvenirs from their honeymoon. The couple fears one of the objects is haunted and reaches out to paranormal investigators for aid.

episodes.name: Gateway to Evil
episodes.overview: Devastated by a friend's senseless murder, a teenage girl holds a seance to communicate one last time and unwittingly invites an malevolent entity into her own home.

episodes.name: Bottled Spirits
episodes.overview: A chef and his wife find the perfect location for their restaurant in a cozy waterfront town, but the spirits haunting the Victorian mansion have other plans; soon, eerie and unexplained events threaten to force the couple out of business.

episodes.name: Deliverance in Chicago
episodes.overview: A loving family is living their dream life until demonic forces move in.

episodes.name: Daydreams and Nightmares
episodes.overview: A woman's dream of opening a successful costume shop is interrupted when she discovers the building she just bought comes with resident spirits. When the haunting grows dangerous, she calls on a spiritualist minister to help the trapped souls cross over.

episodes.name: Inner Demons
episodes.overview: Childhood sweethearts reconnect, but their happily-ever-after is threatened by dangerous poltergeist activity in their new home. When they find cryptic messages written on the bathroom mirror, the frightened couple reaches out to a renowned demonologist.

episodes.name: Asylum 49
episodes.overview: A lifelong haunted house enthusiast purchases an old hospital to build a Halloween attraction. As staff members prepare for the grand opening, they experience a series of paranormal events suggesting that the location is really haunted.

episodes.name: Return to Bergen House
episodes.overview: A woman finds herself in a nightmare when she is forced to return to the home that haunted her childhood. When the spirits get aggressive, paranormal researchers and psychics band together to give her what she's wanted for decades -- answers.

episodes.name: Nevermore
episodes.overview: A couple finds themselves under attack by paranormal forces summoned by a jealous ex. As the dark spirits grow more violent, they turn to multiple paranormal experts in an attempt to break the curse by any means before it breaks them up.

episodes.name: The Devil's Doll
episodes.overview: A woman is enchanted by a pair of antique dolls and brings them home. Soon after, she is stricken by a mysterious illness that nearly kills her, and her husband is sure the dolls are to blame. The couple must take drastic steps to contain the evil within.

episodes.name: The Man in the Closet
episodes.overview: A family awakens a vengeful spirit when they renovate a century-old farmhouse in Massachusetts. After a near-fatal encounter, they bring in a team of paranormal experts to settle the score with the invisible intruder.

episodes.name: Deliver Us From Evil
episodes.overview: A newlywed couple experiences unexplained events after moving into a remote cabin. When they make a gruesome discovery, they fear the previous owner never left. After a terrifying attack, they must find a way to expel the angry spirit before it's too late.
